ai_description: A roll of pink and white patterned cleaning cloths with a distinctive wavy texture, presented in a convenient roll format. The product comes wrapped in clear plastic packaging with a white label displaying the OKS brand and product details. The cloths are wound around a brown cardboard core and feature a non-woven fabric construction. The vibrant pink and white pattern is visible across the entire roll, suggesting an absorbent and textured surface ideal for various cleaning tasks. The lifestyle shot shows the cloth being used in a bathroom setting, indicating its versatility for household cleaning.
